articles.content: iQOO has announced two new smartphones in India that add to the Z6 series. The two new phones are the iQOO Z6 Pro and the iQOO Z6 4G. Along with the iQOO Z6, the company now has a total of three phon… [+1738 chars]

articles.title: Realme GT 2 is going on sale starting today: Everything to know - Times Now
articles.description: The Realme GT 2 is going on sale for the first time in India today starting at 12pm on Flipkart.
